message.content:
1. There was an intervention.
2. After the intervention, there were significant improvements in the Lequesne index.
3. The p-value for the improvement in the Lequesne index was 0.0217.
4. After the intervention, there were significant improvements in the Oswestry Disability Index.
5. The p-value for the improvement in the Oswestry Disability Index was 0.0112.
6. After the intervention, there were significant improvements in the range of motion of trunk extension.
7. The p-value for the improvement in the range of motion of trunk extension was 0.0320.
8. After the intervention, there were significant improvements in trunk flexion muscle strength.
9. The p-value for the improvement in trunk flexion muscle strength was 0.0459.
10. After the intervention, there were significant improvements in hip extension muscle strength.
11. The p-value for the improvement in hip extension muscle strength was 0.0062.
12. After the intervention, there were significant improvements in hip abduction muscle strength.
13. The p-value for the improvement in hip abduction muscle strength was 0.0257.

messages.content:
Statement: After the intervention, significant improvements were observed regarding the Lequesne index (p-value = 0.0217), Oswestry Disability Index (p-value = 0.0112), range of motion of trunk extension (p-value = 0.0320), trunk flexion muscle strength (p-value = 0.0459), hip extension and abduction muscle strength (p-value = 0.0062 and p-value = 0.0257, respectively).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
